name: Something Left Behind
description:
In the cold arctic, you have the task of finding the path to the safe zone, using your markers and flares to light the way. However, you can not take too long, as that would lead to death from the freezing temperature.
On your path, you may find clues about what happened to the previous survivor group that never returned.

Headphones are recommended.

Keys:
- Arrow keys/WASD: Movement
- E: Leave a light marker on the ground. If close enough to an already laid-down marker, pressing E will pick it up again.
- R: Throw a flare to get a temporarily larger zone of light.
- F: Drink a bottle of whiskey to temporarily maintain some warmth. Use sparingly, as you have a limited amount of whiskey.

Made by:
- Alejandra Mesa: Designer
- Simon Bøg: Programmer
- Mathies Wiencke: Programmer
- Ingi Muller: Designer
